description: Thanks to Chef Mark & Elizabeth Barley and their blazing red trailer, Northern California is being treated to some real amazing Southern comfort cuisine. After developing a dazzling culinary career in the world of fine dining, Chef Mark decided to take his talents in another direction and put a gourmet twist on good ole’ home cookin’. And with his incredible wife Elizabeth by his side, they together created Southern Comfort Express, where you’re invited to come warm your bellies and souls with their savory selection of country cravings.  You must try their famous Red Neck Fries with cheese, gravy, crispy bacon, parsley, and hot sauce, or their Po’ Boys with catfish and Cajun shrimp, or some heavenly homemade hushpuppies, or fresh hot fried Alligator sliders on fluffy southern biscuits. For all this and much more, be sure to call on Southern Comfort Express to come cater your next fun event, and impress your guests with this exceptionally tasty food.
name: Southern Comfort Express
